personas.title: AI Orchestration Architect
personas.subtitle: AI-Native Systems & Agentic Infrastructure
personas.thesis: I am an AI-Native Architect specializing in the orchestration of autonomous agent swarms. I treat code as a structural medium directed by narrative theory, using AI to build safe, scalable systems that bridge high-level intention with production-grade execution.

featured_projects.impact: Directed the creation of a polymorphic orchestration framework with 9 communication topologies and 22 agent archetypes. Established mandatory safety sandboxing and resource limits across a 1,095+ test validation suite.
Architected a high-volume documentation methodology for human-AI co-creation. Scaled technical output to ~400K words across 91 repositories with automated quality gates and link-integrity validation.
Modeled a multi-agent deliberation framework for autonomous consensus-building. Implemented weighted decision-making algorithms and real-time state management for agent swarms.
Engineered an NLP-driven text decomposition framework to ground AI tool-use in ontological structures, mapping rhetorical patterns to executable system logic.

personas.market_summary: 15+ years of strategic delivery and multimedia impact. AI-Native Architect who directed the development of a 91-repo ecosystem with 1,000+ tests. Expertise in system orchestration, automated governance, and the rhetoric of code.

personas.title: Systems Architect / Backend Lead
personas.subtitle: Engineering Rigor & Logocentric Architecture
personas.thesis: I apply the rigor of linguistic analysis and narrative theory to software architecture. I specialize in building highly reliable systems, custom domain-specific languages (DSLs), and automated governance frameworks for massive repository ecosystems.

featured_projects.impact: Developed a symbolic OS in Python featuring an external DSL and a custom interpreter. Achieved 85% code coverage across 1,254 tests, formalizing narrative principles as structural primitives.
Engineered the central nervous system for a 91-repository ecosystem. Automated dependency validation (31 unique edges) and implemented a machine-readable governance registry.
Architected a distributed monorepo for real-time performance systems. Integrated Python core engines with TypeScript SDKs, providing a unified API for audience-participatory applications.
Built a production UCC data pipeline with 60+ collection agents. Implemented Terraform-managed AWS infrastructure and a 2,055+ test suite for high-reliability data extraction.

personas.market_summary: Expert in complex system reliability. Built a symbolic OS with a custom DSL and 1,254 tests (85% coverage). Orchestrated a 91-repo fleet with automated dependency validation and zero back-edge violations.

personas.title: Lead Creative Technologist
personas.subtitle: R&D at the Intersection of Theory & Code
personas.thesis: I am an artist-engineer bridging MFA-level narrative theory with Meta-certified technical execution. I build 'living' systems and performance-grade tools that treat code, sound, and language as a unified medium for exploration.

featured_projects.impact: Launched the 'etceter4' Living Pantheon website. Engineered a 'breathing' UI with generative pathway logic and subtle motion dynamics using Vanilla JS and performance-optimized animations.
Developed a performance-grade audio synthesis engine using the Web Audio API. Mapped symbolic data structures to real-time sonic parameters for live generative composition.
Translated classical narrative theory (Aristotle, Propp) into executable software lenses. Created computational tools for analyzing and generating structural plot arcs.
Engineered 'TurfSynth AR,' a spatial computing concept applying neighborhood topology to location-aware gameplay. Bridged physical environment data with game-state persistence.

personas.market_summary: Bridging humanities and engineering for 10+ years. Developed the 'Living Pantheon' artistic ecosystem. Specialized in generative systems, spatial computing (AR), and narrative-as-software primitives.

personas.title: Technical Program Manager / DevEx
personas.subtitle: Strategic Delivery & Platform Governance
personas.thesis: I combine a decade of high-impact project management with modern engineering depth. I specialize in managing the developer experience (DevEx) for complex technical ecosystems, ensuring strategic alignment between product, art, and infrastructure.

featured_projects.impact: Designed a meta-governance model for coordinating 8 GitHub organizations. Synchronized theory, art, commerce, and community into a single strategic roadmap with 33 successful sprints.
Authored machine-readable promotion criteria and monthly audit protocols. Automated the validation of system-wide invariants across 91 repositories.
Led the public distribution strategy for complex technical R&D. Managed a narrative layer of 36 essays (~132K words) with RSS and multi-channel synchronization.
Integrated POSSE (Publish on Own Site, Syndicate Elsewhere) architecture. Automated cross-platform audience engagement for high-dimensional intellectual property.

personas.market_summary: Managed 100+ projects and $2M in revenue. Rebuilt Miami Dade Foundation's digital presence (328% ROI). Currently leading an automated 91-repo orchestration system with 77 active CI/CD workflows.
